awd_abstract_narration: This proposal is concerned with developing new                                  theory as well as the computational tools                                       necessary to make l1 optimal control theory a                                   useful tool for designing robust systems.  In                                   particular, performance robustness can be                                       treated in a very straightforward way when the                                  objective function is stated in terms of the                                    l1 norm.  The proposal points out how this can                                  be done in the scalar case and indicates what                                   can also be done in the multivariable case,                                     which is the primary motivation of the                                          research.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems
